TI_TEXT.P: BERD - Egipto: Programa de renovación de locomotoras
BERD - Égypte : Programme de renouvellement des locomotives
ΕΤΑΑ - Αίγυπτος: Πρόγραμμα ανανέωσης μηχανών τρένων
BERS - Egitto: Programma di rinnovo delle locomotive
EBWO - Egypte: Programma ter vernieuwing van locomotieven
BERD - Egito: Programa de renovação de locomotivas

ЕБВР - Египет: Програма за подновяване на локомотиви
BERD - Egipt: Program de reînnoire a locomotivelor

STI_DOC.P: Supply and Maintenance of New Locomotives
General Procurement Notice

CONTENTS.P: Contract type: project goods, works and services

Egyptian National Railways (‘ENR’) intends using the proceeds of a loan from the European Bank for reconstruction and development (the Bank) to finance ENR locomotive renewal programme and support wider sector reform and the development of a lower carbon and an accessible transport system.
The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of 290 000 000 EUR, will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services:
— acquisition of up to 100 new diesel electric locomotives to operate on the passenger long distance routes.
Tendering for the above contract is expected to begin in the 4th quarter of 2019.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the Bank will be subject to the bank's procurement policies and rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the Bank's loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, or for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers and contractors should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , General Manager of the Project Management Unit, Postal Address: Railways Compound, fifth floor, above Shubra Tunnel, Ramsis Square,

TI_DOC.P: BERD - Egipt: Program de reînnoire a locomotivelor (EG-Cairo)

STI_DOC.P: Supply and Maintenance of New Locomotives
General Procurement Notice

CONTENTS.P: Contract type: project goods, works and services

Egyptian National Railways (‘ENR’) intends using the proceeds of a loan from the European Bank for reconstruction and development (the Bank) to finance ENR locomotive renewal programme and support wider sector reform and the development of a lower carbon and an accessible transport system.
The proposed project, which has a total estimated cost of 290 000 000 EUR, will require the procurement of the following goods, works and services:
— acquisition of up to 100 new diesel electric locomotives to operate on the passenger long distance routes.
Tendering for the above contract is expected to begin in the 4th quarter of 2019.

Contracts to be financed with the proceeds of a loan from the Bank will be subject to the bank's procurement policies and rules and will be open to firms from any country. The proceeds of the Bank's loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, or for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law of official regulation of the purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers and contractors should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , General Manager of the Project Management Unit, Postal Address: Railways Compound, fifth floor, above Shubra Tunnel, Ramsis Square,
